page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content: {Halstead Swimming Club}trains on Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday and Friday nights and Saturday mornings. On the training nights you swim 30 lengths to warm up,then training starts. The pool is not very long or wide and there is not much shallow end for small children to learn how to swim. At the end of the training sessions we have relays. The senior A is the best group. Junior A is the next best and B is the third and C is the worst. The galas are always on Saturdays. Every sixty days we have time trials. That means we swim a length and see if our times are quicker than before. You could get a medal for improving the most. There is a medal for each group. If you want to get a sprint award you have to get a certain time. To join the club you go for a trial on the first Friday of the month.
